verbose_text: Phenotypically, smtA knock out mutants are hypersensitive to Zn 2+, and to a lesser extent to Cd 2+, with no effect on tolerance to other metal ions, even though smtA transcription is stimulated not only by Zn 2+ (which is by far the strongest inducer) and Cd 2+, but also Hg 2+, Cu 2+, Co 2+, Cr 3+, and Ni 2+.
evidence: stimulated not only by Zn 2+  (which is by far the strongest inducer) and Cd 2+ , but also Hg 2+ , Cu 2+ , Co
